message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business.  My initial price is $1,750,000.  This reflects the high quality and potential of the product. I'm open to discussing your perspective and exploring a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. While I understand its potential, my budget allows me to invest up to $1,500,000 in this purchase. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,500,000 to move forward with the transaction.
